src:
Ini Hasil Interogasi WNA yang Diciduk di Takengon
03 Nov 2019, 13:50 by Satiran


Ini Hasil Interogasi WNA yang Diciduk di Takengon

KBRN, Takengon : Seorang Warga Negara Asing (WNA) yang berkeliaran di kawasan kota Takengon diamankan petugas Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon bersama Tim Kanwil Kemenkumham Aceh yang dipimpin langsung oleh Kepala Divisi keimigrasian Kanwil Kemenkumham Aceh Herdaus.
Hasil interogasi atau pemeriksaan, WNA tersebut hendak mencari kerja di daerah yang sejuk dan penghasil kopi.
Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon , Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra kepada RRI menyampaikan saat ini WNA yang diduga berasal dari Negara Bangladesh tersebut ditempatkan di ruang Detensi Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon.
“Tujuan dia ke kota Takengon ini, mencari-cari kerjaan. Namun dari gestur berdasarkan laporan masyarakat ini orang asing, jadi kita amankan,” ujar Detensi Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon. Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon , Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra kepada RRI, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Baca Petugas Imigrasi Takengon Ciduk WNA Diduga Langgar Keimigrasian
Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon juga melakukan pendalaman pemeriksaan hingga bagaimana WNA inisial MB sampai di Takengon.
Hasilnya, ternyata sebut Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon, WNA tersebut adalah pengungsi yang berasal dari Aceh Timur tahun 2015.
“Dia ini pernah dulu yang masuk dari Aceh Timur. Tahun 2015. Mungkin salah satu pengungsi lah. Tapi bukan Rohingya. Beda lagi,” tutup Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon.
Diberitakan sebelumnya tim Kanwil Kemenkumham Aceh mengamankan Warga Negara Asing (WNA) di Takengon yang diduga melanggar Keimigrasian.
MB, kedapatan melanggar izin keimigrasian yaitu tidak terdapat izin tinggal dan dokumen keimigrasian.
text:
This is the result of the questioning of foreigners arrested in Takengon
03 Nov 2019, 13:50 by Satiran


This is the result of the questioning of foreigners arrested in Takengon

KBRN, Takengon: A Foreign Citizen (WNA) wandering around the Takengon city area was secured by the Takengon Class III Immigration officer Takengon together with the Aceh Kemenkumham Regional Office Team led directly by the Head of the Immigration Regional Office of Aceh Herdaus.
As a result of interrogation or inspection, the foreigner wants to find work in a cool and coffee-producing area.
The Head of the Takengon Class III Non-TPI Immigration Office, Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra told RRI that currently the foreigners suspected of originating from Bangladesh were placed in the Detention Room of the Takengon Class III Non-Immigration Immigration Office.
"He headed to Takengon, looking for work. But from the gesture based on the reports of these foreigners, so we secure it, "said Deteng Office of Immigration Class III Non TPI Takengon. Head of the Takengon Class III Immigration Office, Takachon, Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra to RRI, Sunday (3/11/2019).
Read Takengon Immigration Officer Ciduk WNA Allegedly Violate Immigration
Immigration Class III Non TPI Takengon also conducted an examination of how the initials of foreigners arrived at Takengon.
As a result, it turns out the Head of the Immigration Office Class III Non TPI Takengon, foreigners are refugees who came from East Aceh in 2015.
"He once entered from East Aceh. 2015. Maybe one of the refugees. But not the Rohingya. Different again, "closed the Head of the Immigration Office Class III Non TPI Takengon.
Reported earlier the Aceh Kankumham Regional Office team secured Foreign Citizens (foreigners) in Takengon who allegedly violated Immigration.
MB, was found violating the immigration permit that is there is no residence permit and immigration documents.
